Commentary: Anwar Ali to Mohammad Hafeez, no run, full and aimed at off, Hafeez presses forward and blocks to cover
Anwar Ali to Mohammad Hafeez, no run, back of a length and zips away outside off, Hafeez prods at it before dragging his bat inside the line
Anwar Ali to Mohammad Hafeez, no run, full on off, patted to point on the front foot
Anwar Ali to Mohammad Hafeez, no run, angling into the pads, deflected behind to the keeper
Anwar Ali to Mohammad Hafeez, 2 runs, pitched up and outside off, driven to mid-off, they take another one via a ricochet off the stumps
Anwar Ali to Mohammad Hafeez, 2 byes, full and jags back in sharply from outside off, cuts the batsman into half. Beats the keeper as well
Zulfiqar Babar to Kamran Akmal, no run, drifting in on middle, poked towards point
Zulfiqar Babar to Kamran Akmal, no run, flighted and outside off, Akmal goes against the spin. He can't put bat on the slog sweep
Zulfiqar Babar to Kamran Akmal, FOUR, pitched up outside off, Akmal drills it through point
Zulfiqar Babar to Kamran Akmal, no run, flat and darted in, punchily played back to Babar
Zulfiqar Babar to Kamran Akmal, no run, short and wide outside off, back-foot cut to cover-point
Zulfiqar Babar to Kamran Akmal, no run, hint of turn, pushed to cover
Aizaz Cheema to Mohammad Hafeez, no run, this free-hit full ball is cracked back to the bowler
Aizaz Cheema to Mohammad Hafeez, FOUR, dug in short, Hafeez swivels on the back foot, rolls his wrists and hits a pull to the midwicket boundary
Aizaz Cheema to Mohammad Hafeez, FOUR, dug in outside off now, flat-bat wallop straight down the ground, leaving Cheema in a fritz
Aizaz Cheema to Mohammad Hafeez, no run, hurrying short ball on off, Hafeez hops, gets on top of the bounce and quells it towards cover
Aizaz Cheema to Mohammad Hafeez, no run, full on off, defended towards point on the front foot
Aizaz Cheema to Mohammad Hafeez, 1 run, back of a length and outside off, punched wide of backward point. Finally, the over comes to an end
Zulfiqar Babar to Mohammad Hafeez, no run, turn and bounce, dabbed past slip
Zulfiqar Babar to Mohammad Hafeez, 1 run, full on middle and leg, clipped to mid-on who is hanging back
Zulfiqar Babar to Kamran Akmal, FOUR, full at off, Kamran drops to one knee, gets close to the pitch and slog-sweeps it to the cow corner boundary
Zulfiqar Babar to Kamran Akmal, no run, round-arm dart, catches the back pad, but it was slipping down
Zulfiqar Babar to Kamran Akmal, no run, short ball, chopped from the stumps to point
Zulfiqar Babar to Kamran Akmal, 1 run, inside-out drive to cover, where Shehzad fumbles, allowing a single
Anwar Ali to Kamran Akmal, no run, full on off, driven to mid-off
Anwar Ali to Kamran Akmal, no run, back of a length on off, jabbed back
Anwar Ali to Kamran Akmal, OUT, The middle stump is pegged back. Lovely inducker, nips back in sharply, rips through the gate. Poor shot selection as Akmal attempts a cut. Equally poor footwork
Anwar Ali to Shahid Yousuf, 1 leg bye, slanting in and hits the pad, leg bye
Anwar Ali to Mohammad Hafeez, 1 run, full and around off, he seeks to drive and inside-edges it to leg
Anwar Ali to Shahid Yousuf, no run, back of a length and largely holds its line outside off. Beaten
Mohammad Nawaz to Mohammad Hafeez, OUT, bowled'em. Slides in with good bounce, Hafeez falls to an ill-advised cut as well. He does not connect. The off stump is pegged back now
Mohammad Nawaz to Hodge, OUT, whoa! That's a rippaaaah. Hodge goes for a golden duck! Drifts in, pitches on middle, zips past the outside edge to hit off. Hodge loses his balance and topples over
Mohammad Nawaz to Bairstow, 1 run, skids in short on off, worked to the leg side as Bairstow averts the hat-trick
Mohammad Nawaz to Shahid Yousuf, no run, drifts in full, pushed back to the bowler
Mohammad Nawaz to Shahid Yousuf, no run, flat on off, forward and blocked to cover
Mohammad Nawaz to Shahid Yousuf, no run, full on middle, slapped straight to mid-on
Aizaz Cheema to Bairstow, 1 run, Bairstow uses his feet and shuffles across as he turns a single to midwicket
Aizaz Cheema to Shahid Yousuf, 1 run, jabbed to mid-on for a quick one
Aizaz Cheema to Bairstow, 1 run, short on off, tucked behind square
Aizaz Cheema to Shahid Yousuf, 1 run, short on off and middle, whipped to midwicket
Aizaz Cheema to Bairstow, no run, short and wide outside off, mishit to cover
Aizaz Cheema to Bairstow, no run, full on off, stops a bit on the batsman, chipped towards midwicket
Mohammad Nawaz to Shahid Yousuf, no run, drifts in on off, blocked
Mohammad Nawaz to Shahid Yousuf, no run, skids in full, inside-edged onto the pad? The lbw appeal is turned down. I guess it was pad first. Nawaz is not pleased
Mohammad Nawaz to Shahid Yousuf, 1 run, full and straight, inside-out drive in the air to deep cover
Mohammad Nawaz to Bairstow, 1 run, flicked from off stump through midwicket
Mohammad Nawaz to Shahid Yousuf, 1 run, tossed up on off, driven to long-off
Mohammad Nawaz to Bairstow, 2 runs, full on middle, laced to deep cover for two
Elliott to Shahid Yousuf, 1 run, full roller on middle, knocked in front of midwicket
Elliott to Bairstow, 2 runs, back of a length and outside off, crunched past cover
Elliott to Bairstow, no run, floated full and just a shade outside off, beats the batsman

Elliott to Bairstow, no run, swipe and a miss outside off. The batsman loses his balance as Sarfraz takes the bails off. Bairstow was beaten for the change of pace. But he had grounded his back foot in time
Elliott to Bairstow, 1 run, pitched up and outside off, bunted to long-off
Elliott to Shahid Yousuf, no run, slower full one outside off, push-driven straight to cover
Mohammad Nawaz to Bairstow, 1 run, full and drifts in, takes the inside edge and runs past square leg
Mohammad Nawaz to Shahid Yousuf, no run, tossed up outside off, reverse scoop and a miss
Mohammad Nawaz to Shahid Yousuf, FOUR, tossed up, down the track and lifted straight over the bowler's head. Nice stroke, Afridi's daughter applauds from the stands
Mohammad Nawaz to Shahid Yousuf, 1 run, heading down leg, tickled to short fine leg with a sweep
Mohammad Nawaz to Bairstow, 1 run, flat and quick on off, slugged to long-on, on the bounce
Mohammad Nawaz to Shahid Yousuf, no run, looped up and comes in, another reverse scoop and a miss
Elliott to Bairstow, no run, poked to backward point off the outside edge
Elliott to Bairstow, FOUR, full on off, he targets the leg side and gets a leading edge past backward point, to the third man fence

Elliott to Bairstow, OUT, Elliott roars, Peshwar four down. Legcutter, Bairstow aims to cut square. He can't touch it. Elliott, however,hits off. Bairstow is the fourth batsman to be out bowled in the chase
Elliott to Sammy, no run, full and comes in on off, pushed back
Elliott to Sammy, no run, bouncer on the leg stump, ducks under it
Elliott to Sammy, no run, short on middle, tucks Sammy up for room. Punchily defended back
Zulfiqar Babar to Shahid Yousuf, FOUR, flighted on middle, Yousuf goes low on one knee and sweeps over backward square leg
Zulfiqar Babar to Shahid Yousuf, no run, arm ball snakes in to hit the pad
Zulfiqar Babar to Shahid Yousuf, 1 run, short on middle, punched past midwicket
Zulfiqar Babar to Sammy, no run, looped up and outside off, Sammy reaches out for a push to cover
Zulfiqar Babar to Sammy, no run, round-arm dart, punched to cover now
Zulfiqar Babar to Sammy, no run, tapped to cover again
Elliott to Shahid Yousuf, OUT, Sarfraz runs towards Babar and jumps onto him. Back of a length on off, slogged to deep midwicket. Babar takes a dolly. Viv Richards is delighted in the Quetta dug out
Elliott to Shahid Afridi, 1 bye, slower ball outside off, dupes Afridi. Swipe and miss
Elliott to Sammy, no run, wide line outside off, slapped to N-Mac at point
Elliott to Sammy, no run, short ball, ugly heave to midwicket
Elliott to Sammy, FOUR, width outside off, Sammy creates his own pace and slaps it past point. Nawaz chases hard to his left from sweeper cover, dives, but only comes second
Wicket: ['Shahid Yousuf c Zulfiqar Babar b Elliott 15 (21b 2x4 0x6) SR: 71.42']

Commentary: Elliott to Sammy, 1 run, back of a length on off, punched square for one
Aizaz Cheema to Sammy, FOUR, full and wide outside off, Sammy tees off. Muscles it over backward point
Aizaz Cheema to Sammy, no run, quick short ball on off, top-edged pull.... Lands in front of mid-off
Aizaz Cheema to Sammy, no run, Sammy loads up, this may be a slower ball on off. Worked to the leg side for one
Aizaz Cheema to Sammy, no run, bouncer, ducks under and avoids it
Aizaz Cheema to Sammy, FOUR, short and rises outside off, Sammy gets on top of the bounce and slugs it over midwicket. Wild heave-ho
Aizaz Cheema to Sammy, 2 runs, back of a length slower ball outside off, Sammy punches through backward point
Elliott to Shahid Afridi, 1 run, full on off, milked down to long-on. Hmm, sensible single from Afridi
Elliott to Sammy, 2 runs, pitched up, slow and outside off, caressed past cover. KP tidies up in the deep
Elliott to Sammy, 1 run, short on middle and leg, forced to long-on
Elliott to Shahid Afridi, 1 run, width outside off, carved to point
Elliott to Sammy, 1 run, back of a length on off, punched past cover

Elliott to Shahid Afridi, OUT, Afridi holes out to Nawaz. Dubai has been hushed into silence. Afridi steps away, this is floated wide outside off. He reaches out and slices it straight to backward point. Elliott finishes with three scalps
Zulfiqar Babar to Wahab Riaz, 1 run, slides on outside off, punched past point
Zulfiqar Babar to Sammy, 1 run, angled in from wide of the crease, Sammy jabs his bat down and manages an inside edge to leg
Zulfiqar Babar to Wahab Riaz, 2 runs, low full toss on off, driven to long-off for a couple
Zulfiqar Babar to Wahab Riaz, no run, arm ball snakes in to rap the pad but this was going down leg
Zulfiqar Babar to Wahab Riaz, no run, blockhole ball on middle, jammed through cover
Wicket: ['Shahid Afridi c Mohammad Nawaz b Elliott 2 (4b 0x4 0x6) SR: 50.00']

Commentary: Zulfiqar Babar to Wahab Riaz, 1 run, pushed towards point from off
Anwar Ali to Wahab Riaz, 1 run, full on the stumps, driven down the ground
Anwar Ali to Sammy, FOUR, back of a length and outside off, Sammy winds up for a massive slog on the back foot. He sends a thick edge through vacant slip
Anwar Ali to Sammy, no run, good slower ball outside off, beats Sammy's cut
Anwar Ali to Sammy, no run, slower short ball outside off, left alone. Sammy looks towards the umpire for a wide. Not given
Anwar Ali to Sammy, 1 run, short ball on off, dragged to long-on. Long-on attacks the ball, keeping it to one
Anwar Ali to Wahab Riaz, FOUR, pitched up and outside off, the batsman pushes and edges it past the diving keeper
Mohammad Nawaz to Sammy, 1 run, fired outside off, clubbed to long-off
Mohammad Nawaz to Wahab Riaz, 1 run, slides on straight, driven through cover
Mohammad Nawaz to Sammy, SIX, quicker and shorter outside off, Sammy sits back and pummels it over long-on
Mohammad Nawaz to Sammy, FOUR, another flat, fast one, Sammy cudgels it to the cow corner fence. It does not look pretty but that will do for Peshawar
Mohammad Nawaz to Sammy, 2 runs, full and outside off, drilled to left of long-off
Mohammad Nawaz to Sammy, OUT, Viv Richards takes high-fives in the dug out; Sammy falls. Slides in on off, Sammy sets up for another heave. This time he holes out to N-Mac at long-on
Anwar Ali to Hasan Ali, FOUR, length ball on off, Hasan punts it over mid-off
Anwar Ali to Hasan Ali, 1 run, nice and full on off, Anwar finds the outside edge, which runs towards short third man, Cheema flings to his left and stops the ball
Anwar Ali to Wahab Riaz, 2 runs, too full on off, Wahab drops to one knee and goes over the covers
Anwar Ali to Wahab Riaz, FOUR, low full toss on the pads. That's a gift.... whipped away through backward square leg
Anwar Ali to Wahab Riaz, no run, short and outside off, he throws his hands at a cut and misses. Wahab is distraught with himself
Wicket: ['DJG Sammy c McCullum b Mohammad Nawaz 38 (29b 5x4 1x6) SR: 131.03']

Commentary: Anwar Ali to Wahab Riaz, 1 run, glanced off the legs to short fine leg
Aizaz Cheema to Wahab Riaz, no run, full and angled from wide of the crease, Wahab loads up for a slap over the covers. He can't touch it
Aizaz Cheema to Wahab Riaz, FOUR, low full toss on off, Wahab spanks it to the cow corner boundary
Aizaz Cheema to Wahab Riaz, 1 run, dug in short on off, the top edge lands in front of long-on

Aizaz Cheema to Hasan Ali, OUT, rushing short ball on off, Hasan aims for a gallery hit. He only sends a top edge into the air..... Cheema moves forward and to his right towards the short-midwicket region and hangs onto the pressure catch

Aizaz Cheema to Wahab Riaz, OUT, Sir Viv is up on his feet, he is thrilled. Sammy has his hands on his head. Short and wide outside off, carved in the air. Another skier. Shehzad hangs onto this catch at point even as he tumbles onto the ground. Shehzad is pumped

Aizaz Cheema to Mohammad Asghar, 1 run, Cheema wins a thriller for Quetta; they are through to the final. Big celebrations in the Quetta camp. Viv Richards is jumping amid his boys. Rising short ball, Asghar shapes to pull/slog and ends up flapping it back towards the bowler
